text: And they shall come from the cities of Judah, and from the places round about Jerusalem, and from the land of Benjamin, and from the lowland, and from the hill-country, and from the South, bringing burnt-offerings, and sacrifices, and meal-offerings, and frankincense, and bringing <FI>sacrifices of<Fi> thanksgiving, unto the house of Jehovah.
name: Jeremiah 17:26
